ISSUE.TITLE: Bad request: Missing `name` field
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hey Everyone, I've been trying to deploy a Docker container with now, and I'm constantly getting the following error - ``` $ now --docker > Deploying ~/Code/jsjs-web > Error! Bad request. Missing `name` field. ``` Things I tried to fix this (on Now v0.27.0) - 1. Relogin 2. Deploying static files to now and then retrying. 3. Trying it with another email 4. Asking a couple of friends to create an account and try to deploy other docker files with their logins. Sadly, none of these worked. Here's a screenshot if it helps ![dokcer](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/649249/19822882/bb517542-9d33-11e6-8f12-bc2457edebe2.png) Any ideas on how to fix this?

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Don't default to `@now/static when builds are missing` (#102)
Merge pull request #102 from vercel/update-main-oct-25-update-telemetry-url Update telemetry endpoint
